title: Managing Your Money - Investing During Stressful Times
description: Barron's Senior Writer Lauren Foster speaks with psychologist and New York Times bestselling author Dr. Daniel Crosby, chief behavioral officer at Orion Advisor Solutions, about making financial decisions during times of stress and market volatility.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's Senior Writer Lauren Foster speaks with psychologist and New York Times bestselling author Dr. Daniel Crosby, chief behavioral officer at Orion Advisor Solutions, about making financial decisions during times of stress and market volatility.
